title: Episode 93 "Politically Incorrect" w/ the Drink Champs Family
itunes:title: Episode 93 "Politically Incorrect" w/ the Drink Champs Family
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink champs. In this episode the guys got together with the Drink Champs family and discuss various topics from the upcoming fight, Jay-Z recent podcast appearance, North Korea, recent racial issues, and a lot more. Basically the guys made an excuse to get drunk and talk reckless. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
